item.title: Biden Tax Hike Largest Since 1968...
item.description:
www.atr.org
The $3.5 trillion tax hike being pushed by President Biden and congressional Democrats would be the largest tax increase since 1968. In nominal dollars, Biden’s $3.5 trillion tax increase would be the largest in history. But even when comparing this tax as a percentage of the economy, this tax hike would be the largest in more than 50 years. While Democrats claim this tax increase will fall on “the rich," the proposal will raise taxes on small businesses and working families.
